## Atomic vector

```{r}
num1 <- 5
vNum1 <- c(2,5)
vNum2 <- c(2, num1)
```
stacking vector
```{r}
vNum1 <- c(-1,5)
vNum2 <- c(2,3)
vNum3 <- c(vNum1,vNum2)
vNum4 <- c(-1,5,2,3)
vNum5 <- c(c(-1,5),c(2,3))
```

```{r}
vNum1 <- c(-1,5)
vNum2 <- c(2,3)
vNum4 <- c() # 空向量
```

```{r}
vNum3 <- c(vNum2, vNum1)
vNum4 <- c(vNum4, vNum1) # 向量疊代 （recursive vector concatenate）
```

## Different types

```{r}
num1<-5 # 非整數
num2<-5L # 整數

num1Vector<-c(5,6,7)
num2Vector<-c(5L,6L,7L)
```
```{r}
typeof(num1Vector)
typeof(num2Vector)
```
